# Install

### Get Clokify API Key

Click on `Profile Settings` -> `API`

### Install

Python3 is required

```
pip3 install Clockipy

```

### Usage

Enter your API Key

```
clockipy

API KEY (q To Quit):

```

Options

1. List Project
2. Show Time Entries
3. Add Time
4. Delete Time
5. Start Timer

![Main Menu](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/null011/ClockiPy/master/images/screen1.png)
